statements: DELETE FROM LeadScoring WHERE user_id = 101 AND website_interaction_score < 50;
DELETE FROM LeadScoring WHERE form_submission_score > 10 OR total_score < 100;
DELETE FROM Form_Submissions WHERE form_name = 'Contact Form';
DELETE FROM interactions WHERE lead_id = '3e392c3e-384d-4b96-88f1-8c0c83fa02ad' AND interaction_type = 'click';
DELETE FROM Lead_Interactions WHERE id = 123 AND user_id = 456;
DELETE FROM Form_Submissions WHERE user_id = 789 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM users WHERE company_name = 'Tech Corp' AND phone_number = '+123456789';
